TopicTitle: My fairing keeps disappearing after lag spikes

Articles.Content:
Mods I have installed:

- Hangar extender

- Hyperedit

-Kopernicus

- Cerillion (adds a planet)

- KER

- Modular flight integrator

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Texture replacer (doesn't work)

- Better time warp (doesn't work)

- Quickmute (doesn't work)

- Reentry particle effect 

 

The issue is very simple and there is no other way to put it. When I play the game and have a lagspike, the fairing will completely disappear and the navball will lose it's grey outline leaving the orange/blue sphere. I don't know what is causing it. I don't know if any of the mods installed are even causing it. It occurred during 1.2.2 and I thought that 1.3 would fix it but it is still happening.
